George Frideric Handel

Air in A major, HWV 468

c. 1727–1728

[IMSLP]

Versions of the theme are also used in the aria L’alma mia fra le tempeste from the opera Agrippina (HWV 6), the aria Molto voglio, molto spero from the first version of the opera Rinaldo (HWV 7a) (also arranged for keyboard, HWV 482/1), the chorus Sì sarà più dolce amore from the opera Muzio Scevola (HWV 13), the original sinfonia to the second act of the opera Ezio (HWV 29), the chorus Dia si lode in cielo from the oratorio La resurrezione (HWV 47), the air These delights if though canst give from the oratorio L’Allegro, il Penseroso ed il Moderato (HWV 55), the aria Heroes when with glory burning from the oratorio Joshua (HWV 64), the aria Chi ben ama ha per oggetti from the serenata Aci, Galatea e Polifemo (HWV 72), and the sinfonia to the cantata Ah crudel! nel pianto mio (HWV 78).

Recommended editions

  • Hallische Händel-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IV/6 · BA 4028 · Klavierwerke III / Einzelne Suiten und Stücke, Erste Folge · ed. Terence Best
  • Associated Board · Selected Keyboard Works, Book 2 · ed. Richard Jones
  • Bärenreiter · BA 4222 · Klavierwerke III / Einzelne Suiten und Stücke, Erste Folge · ed. Terence Best

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2
